CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper February 9, 1946, pg. 23, reads: "Honor Stage Star, U. S. Worker - Miss Coreania Hayman, one of the Cindy Lous in 'Carmen Jones,' and Mrs. Nell Hunter of the interracial division of the U. S. Treasury, were honored guests at a luncheon last Wednesday at the home of Mrs. Charles Meeks, 2514 Centre Avenue. Attending the luncheon, left to right: Mrs. H. N. Robinson, Mrs. Charles Meeks, hostess; Mrs. John Bright, Miss Coreania Hayman, Mrs. Fannie Wallace and Mrs. Nell Hunter. Miss Hayman is a house guest of Mrs. Meeks. - Harris Photo."
TitMainTitle: Luncheon guests Mrs. H. N. Robinson, Mrs. Charles Meeks, Mrs. John Bright, actor Coreania Hayman, Fannie Wallace, and Nell Hunter posed in Meeks home, 2514 Centre Avenue, Hill District
